## Classes

### chronograf

Manages a Chronograf

#### Examples

##### 

```puppet
include chronograf
```

#### Parameters

The following parameters are available in the `chronograf` class.

##### `key_resource`

Data type: `String`



Default value: ''

##### `resource`

Data type: `String`



Default value: ''

##### `software`

Data type: `String`



Default value: 'influxdata'

##### `gpg_manage`

Data type: `Enum['present', 'absent']`



Default value: 'present'

##### `gpg_id`

Data type: `String`



Default value: '05CE15085FC09D18E99EFB22684A14CF2582E0C5'

##### `gpg_server`

Data type: `String`



Default value: 'eu.pool.sks-keyservers.net'

##### `gpg_source`

Data type: `String`



Default value: 'https://repos.influxdata.com/.influxdb.key'

##### `repository_manage`

Data type: `Enum['present', 'absent']`



Default value: 'present'

##### `repos_comment`

Data type: `String`



Default value: 'Chronograf repository'

##### `repos_location`

Data type: `String`



Default value: 'https://repos.influxdata.com/ubuntu'

##### `repos_release`

Data type: `String`



Default value: '%{::os.distro.codename}'

##### `repos`

Data type: `String`



Default value: 'stable'

##### `repos_src`

Data type: `Boolean`



Default value: `false`

##### `repos_bin`

Data type: `Boolean`



Default value: `true`

##### `repos_gpgcheck`

Data type: `Enum['1', '0']`



Default value: '1'

##### `repos_enable`

Data type: `Enum['1', '0']`



Default value: '1'

##### `manage_repo`

Data type: `Boolean`



Default value: `false`

##### `package`

Data type: `String`



Default value: 'chronograf'

##### `package_manage`

Data type: `Enum['present', 'absent']`



Default value: 'present'

Data type: `String`



Default value: 'chronograf'

Data type: `Enum['present', 'absent']`



Default value: 'present'

##### `group_system`

Data type: `Boolean`



Default value: `true`

##### `user`

Data type: `String`



Default value: 'chronograf'

##### `user_manage`

Data type: `Enum['present', 'absent']`



Default value: 'present'

##### `user_system`

Data type: `Boolean`



Default value: `true`

##### `user_manage_home`

Data type: `Boolean`



Default value: `true`

Data type: `String`



Default value: '/var/lib/'

##### `service_defaults`

Data type: `String`



Default value: '/etc/default/chronograf'

##### `service_defaults_manage`

Data type: `Enum['present', 'absent']`



Default value: 'present'

##### `service_default_template`

Data type: `String`



Default value: 'chronograf/service-defaults.erb'

##### `service_definition`

Data type: `String`



Default value: '/lib/systemd/system/chronograf.service'

##### `service_definition_manage`

Data type: `Enum['present', 'absent']`



Default value: 'present'

Data type: `String`



Default value: 'chronograf/systemd.service.erb'

Data type: `String`



Default value: 'chronograf'

##### `service_provider`

Data type: `String`



Default value: 'systemd'

##### `service_manage`

Data type: `Enum['running', 'absent']`



Default value: 'running'

Data type: `Boolean`



Default value: `true`

Data type: `Boolean`

Data type: `Boolean`



Default value: `true`

Data type: `String`



Default value: '0.0.0.0'

Data type: `String`



Default value: '8888'

Data type: `String`



Default value: '/var/lib/chronograf/chronograf-v1.db'

Data type: `String`



Default value: '/usr/share/chronograf/canned'

Data type: `String`

Data type: `String`

#### Examples

##### 

```puppet

```

#### Parameters

The following parameters are available in the `chronograf::config` class.

### chronograf::connection::influx

Manages the connections to influx

#### Examples

##### 

```puppet
chronograf::connection::influx { 'connection': }
```

#### Parameters

The following parameters are available in the `chronograf::connection::influx` defined type.

##### `connection`

Data type: `String`



Default value: $title

##### `ensure`

Data type: `Enum['present', 'absent']`



Default value: 'present'

##### `id`

Data type: `String`



Default value: '10000'

##### `username`

Data type: `String`



Default value: 'test'

##### `password`

Data type: `String`



Default value: 'test'

##### `url`

Data type: `String`



Default value: 'http://localhost:8086'

##### `type`

Data type: `String`



Default value: 'influx'

##### `insecure_skip_verify`

Data type: `Boolean`



Default value: `false`

##### `default`

Data type: `Boolean`



Default value: `true`

##### `telegraf`

Data type: `String`



Default value: 'telegraf'

##### `organization`

Data type: `String`



Default value: 'example_org'

##### `connection_template`

Data type: `String`



Default value: $chronograf::influx_connection_template

##### `resources_path`

Data type: `String`



Default value: $chronograf::resources_path
